item.title: Forensic Image Formats
item.description: Binary Dump dd Bit for bit copy of the data Often split into smaller file segments for ease of handling Can be easily mounted as a drive on Linux systems Many forensic tools natively support dd images Does NOT calculate the MD5 or SHA1 sum, so must be computed and stored manually dd if={DEVICE} of={OUTPUT_PATH} bs=65536 conv=noerror,sync

item.title: The Forensic Playbook
item.description: Overview Prepare Secure and Seize Preserve Analyse Report Preparation Secure and Seize Meta Legality Make sure your seizure is legal, and that you are authorised to perform the work.

item.title: Case Study: Julie Amero
item.description: "The school has a policy to never shutdown school computers" Context: Issue with the OS, might not start back up .

item.title: Introduction to Digital Forensics
item.description: The capture, recovery and analysis of electronic dat from digital devices for the purpose of investigating a crime and assistance in the prosecution of the crime
